website_summaries.verdict: A great option for customers wanting an extra-long inflatable pong table with a built-in beer cooler.
pros: Holds up to 26 cups in the float
Customers appreciate the thicker raft material for its sturdiness and durability
cons: Does not include pong balls or cups
Can be difficult to blow up

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter actually purchased this float for a pool party this summer. As you can see from the photo, it was a huge hit! Very sturdy too. When the adults weren’t using it, the kiddies used it as a float! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: D. Burger

customer_reviews.title: My daughter bought one for a houseboat trip and enjoyed it, but it got a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought one for a houseboat trip and enjoyed it, but it got a hole in it! Ordered another to have for home pool. Putting cups in holes was hard and if you are wading in water, taking that cup out is near impossible. So, you need to have a drink nearby. Does not come with ping pong balls for playing!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Great party purchase
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a big party I had. Keep the pong beers in the cooler in the middle. The cups are secure, and it seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Keep the box!
customer_reviews.text: I was super hopeful that this inflatable would work out despite the poor reviews. I wish I hadn't purchased this; I bought it and had it delivered as a gift to my long-distance boyfriend and he told me that it arrived with a hole in it and they were unable to blow it up. I would've returned it if possible, but he had already thrown out the box. I would rate this 0 Stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Dani EscobarTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't hold air- maybe unlucky?????
customer_reviews.text: purchased to use in the water at Lake cumberland poker run. Unfortunately, it wouldn't hold air so it went back. Maybe i'm just unlucky because it felt like it was made of good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: ts_soccer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times!  Update - Poor Lid Design - HOLE!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this a lot at the sandbar at the lake. Cups fit snuggly and don’t pop out. My only complaint is that it doesn’t have a place to tie a rope to to keep it from drifting away when not using it. UPDATE - The seam where the flap/lid is attached to the raft tore and therefore opened up the raft with an unrepairable hole. This is a very poor design of attaching the lid/flap in this way and this inflatable is now heading to the garbage. Disappointed that this could not be repaired due to the area of the hole which is created specifically due to the design of the lid/flap attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted, ripped at a seem
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a few hours. After a few games it ripped right at the seem of the cooler door... hoping to get a replacement before a boating trip in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Deflates quickly/More difficult than regular game
customer_reviews.text: It is fun and a neat novelty, but games take forever because it's more difficult since the cups aren't touching. It didn't stay inflated for all that long. The rest of our floats will hold air for weeks, but this one lasts maybe a full day before deflating.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Caylor

customer_reviews.title: Good Design and So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We just elevated our pool time game with this Beer Pong floatie. I had bought another brand previously and it lasted only a few days - this one seems to be in it for the long haul. Love the cup and ball holders and the cooler in the middle. It's very functional for a novelty type of item. And, it's sturdy enough for the kids to play with unlike the previous brand we purchased. Win, win!
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is always the hit at the pool. Perfect way to spend some hanging out in the water. The plastic is nice and thick which allows durability. The cup holes fit red solo cups perfectly! This is a must have for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile and will break
customer_reviews.text: The flap to cover the beers/sodas in the middle is really cheaply made part and you tear one little bit of it than it will rip and your product will be destroyed. Cool product but easy to break
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Took camping and played it in the river. Was a BLAST! Floaters stopped and asked if they could play. We had a Great time playing. Love the cooler in the middle that was super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It inflated easily, it has a little basket in the middle (not insulated so it wont keep ice or drinks cold), and theres extra space for cups not in play.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely AMAZING!! Perfect for parties! Blows up easily and is very durable during any weather! Deff a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: We are having a blast with this pool float game
customer_reviews.text: This has brought us hours of fun. Our areas is windy so ping pong balls didn't work to well so we use golf balls, carefully! But the little ones love to play on it with the ping pong balls and all the holes. ANd we can keep a couple drinks cold in the middle!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie D

customer_reviews.title: Nice float! Cups spread too far apart.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Used it once and had some fun. The only complaint is that the cups are spread so far apart its like your shooting for a isolated cup every time. If the rack was closer together it would be much easier. The ball holder and cup holders on the side are a plus!
customer_reviews.author: John Malik

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the float it’s amazing but I don’t play beer bong with cups spread so far apart I like my style makes it a little harder but it’s a great buy for cheap doesn’t come with balls or cups that should be expected. Easy way to put cups in without breaking dip outside in water so it slides in the holes
customer_reviews.author: Austin E

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved the float, until my dog popped it which she goes on other floats all the time and never pops those. It's a really good size was fun while it lasted will definitely order a new one. Just wish it had rope so I could tie it to the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Coralee

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this pool inflatable is extremely impressive. It’s sturdy, you can use it as a float when you’re not playing. Cooler in the middle is a nice bonus feature. A lot of fun in a 4’ deep pool.
customer_reviews.author: Mrtywal

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping the reviews were wrong...
customer_reviews.text: It was fun for the first few minutes, then it suddenly started deflating. We were so bummed since we did not get to finish our game in the water. We loved the american flag design though.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Goldee07

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality item very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold air. Cheaply made. Cooler is a joke lid doesn’t stay closed fir one thing to stay half way cold!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Barely holds air
customer_reviews.text: Product barely holds air and needs to be blown back up every few days, but on the bright side it does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, thick vinyl material. Easy to inflate, has a wide opening that will accommodate a pump for an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah

customer_reviews.title: Broke from the start...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. When they opened and blew it up the float it instantly started loosening air. We checked all the plug's...they were good. Found a small hole in the seam. Very embarrass to have given this to anyone. There is no option to just get a new one. You have to send the popped one back to get a new one?!?
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Riley

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.. just ideas
customer_reviews.text: Well... it's durable against the sun... I know its not dog proof but within 45m of playing my dog jumped in the pool and swam to it while deflating it with one paw. Also, no matter how much ice we put in the cooler tray.. it melts rather quick and the beers heat up with the hot plastic liner. Is there a way to make it more insulated?
customer_reviews.author: Seann McBride

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Product inflated quicker than first perceived. Only and biggest issue is that it is hardly durable enough. We inflated it the moment it shipped in and after a day of regular use there was already a small hole leaking air. It is now completely unusable. Not sure if I received a faulty product, or if the product itself is faulty. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Liam L

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: How disappointed I am. Bought this last Christmas, finally blew it up yesterday and there is a long hole ohv the seam which can't be patched up. Now I'm out the money and can't use the item
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Hadn’t even used it because when we blew it up within an hour it was deflated!! Blew it up again and it deflated again in under an hour!! Probably the worst purchase I’ve made.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Float
customer_reviews.text: It worked great but got a hole in it after one use
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good at returning your money
customer_reviews.text: Liked the design but only used this for a VERY short while before the ice chest lid ripped at the seam. Quick at returning your money after you send it back, so that was a plus. Got it mid-summer so I just did a return, maybe I’ll try again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Tore after first use
customer_reviews.text: Inflated and used for about an hour before the raft completely tore open. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ChloeNorris

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and so much fun! Great pool game even without any beverage!
customer_reviews.author: Liuvlaf2

customer_reviews.title: Party foul !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 4th of july pool party. I love the design. It has everything you need. Unfortunately it popped on the first game. Some one opened the cooler lid for a beer, an the seam tore where the lid meets the raft. With all this said good luck with the company! Keep fightin!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Junk...had hole in it when arrived...could not use it during vacation!!! I am trying to get a refund....
customer_reviews.author: Randy Z

customer_reviews.title: Popped in less than 3 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. Inflated it, put it in the water, threw maybe 3 ping pong balls and then went to grab it to move it (since it was floating away) and just grabbing it the seam ripped and the whole thing collapsed into the water. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Amisano

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold it’s air
customer_reviews.text: This would have gotten 5 stars overall because it was a great float/toy. However, it does not hold its air and constantly deflates since it arrived. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! This this is a pain in the ass to blow up and keep air! Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke8780

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Pictures make it appear larger than it is. Fun concept, decent construction. Would be great if it came with some form of a teather or way to keep it anchored.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Campo Brown

customer_reviews.title: Popped on day one
customer_reviews.text: Popped on day one, piece of crap. Huge rip off. I've had rafts from 5 below last way longer
customer_reviews.author: jason smith

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty durable. Lots of fun in the pool. I used it to lounge in the pool when not using it for games and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friends pool. They love it. It’s not from the US as it has a different language printed on the box, but that doesn’t take anything away from the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great product, pool fun!
customer_reviews.text: The inflatable beer pong was perfect. We used it for two days straight and it was nothing but a good time. Good quality, the cooler in the middle was kind of useless for us, but it did not interfere with the game. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ward

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times.
customer_reviews.text: Love this float. I don't like spending too much time in the water, but this keeps me entertained for awhile. You shouldn't rely on the cooler in the middle, but the float itself is so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a day
customer_reviews.text: First one deflated immediately upon starting to play on it. Ordered replacement, lasted about 2 games until another hole caused it to deflate. If u want a float for 1 party, fine, but otherwise thats all its good for.
customer_reviews.author: Natty

customer_reviews.title: Good Time
customer_reviews.text: Love this float! It made our “family weekend” memorable. Everyone wanted to take pictures with the float.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Came extra quick and of course the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Came extra quick and of course the colors are so appropriate for this holiday!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Hole in Cup Holder
customer_reviews.text: The product looked great but had a hole in the cup holder that was not able to be patched. This was noticed as soon as it was blown up and placed in the water. I was able to get a refund without any problems and did order another in hopes it was just a fluke. The design is great and is perfect for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best pool pong floatie! High quality!
customer_reviews.text: The is the best quality pool pong floatie I've seen! The space in the middle to store your drinks is genius! It also doubles as a float when flipped. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Has a hole, didn't come with a patch kit. Let down of the whole surprise party.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for a pool party and loved it. The only bad thing is you better brush up on your pong skills because it’s harder to play in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Was a hit at our Labor Day Pool Party. Excellent Quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Meintjes

customer_reviews.title: Cut the cooler lid off To prevent a tear in raft.
customer_reviews.text: It ripped the first time we used it. The cooler is useless and causes the raft to rip.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air
customer_reviews.text: The float came with a hole in it! We had to blow it up multiple times a day in order to play. We love the idea of it and it would have be used all the time, but having to blow it up every time was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.text: It was such a hit, the floaty is very sturdy an adult can even use it to lay out in the pool. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with cups and balls
customer_reviews.text: Sent back did not use because it doesn’t come with the cups and balls.
customer_reviews.author: Porsche Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game but doesn't come with cups or ball
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with cups or ball.....so much fun but just be prepared to supply those items
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Summer Must!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool product! Can’t wait to use it with our friends!
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just received this inflatable beer pong table today. Haven't put it to use but i did get a chance to inflate it. Material looks heavy duty, good size and best of all it has good sized cup holders and a center area to use as a cooler. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: busted within a few hours without heavy use. looking for a replacement for this pool season. wont buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mike Towns

customer_reviews.title: Party favorite
customer_reviews.text: Definitely giftable! Got it for my husband for Father's day! Haven't used it yet but he can't wait to
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Would get again, but be more cautious.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it ripped after the third day of vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Extra cup holders are nice
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun! Haven’t tried using the cooler section for drinks yet, but it is good storage for all the ping pong balls!
customer_reviews.author: NatalieS

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it....
customer_reviews.text: Product description notes that it includes the ping pong balls...none were included. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Hondo

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last a week. Started leaking air through the filling port the second time it was used.
customer_reviews.author: SmileyB

customer_reviews.title: Tore after first use
customer_reviews.text: It was fun while it lasted but after first day it tore at the seems. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a month ago for a party yesterday, blew it up yesterday and it held air for less than a minute started deflating as it was being blown up. Such a waste of almost $50.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product especially for the price. Came with a really nice warranty to would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it zero stars. I received it with a hole in it and inbetween Fall semester starting back and the hurricane (I live in Charleston, SC) I was unable to return because the window closed mid hurricane. I wasted fifty dollars
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: Easy inflation valve durable and solid
customer_reviews.text: Only critique are i wish the cooler was a little deeper it might act like a keel in a boat to keep it from rocking and plus more beer better times. Other than that i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Colten R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun in sun
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while it could keep air. Easily got a hole while laying on it. The cups dont touch making beer long harder than normal but still entertaining
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! Great quality and kept us occupied all weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Cardinal26

customer_reviews.title: A perfect Floater for the quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the pool and to play with family. Love it
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Stays inflated for a while, (Several Days) my daughter fits perfectly in the middle
customer_reviews.author: gee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy for summer days and nights in the pool! Very good material and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Val C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good and cool product. I’ve had enormous joy beating my friends in pool pong. Personally I just wish the cooler was deeper lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love playing this in pool!
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten so much use out of this! Need to buy cups and balls though!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this and a seam on the top broke open within 30 minutes of it being inflated. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: GraceMarie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Would buy again, but don't think I'll need to!!
customer_reviews.author: jen flory

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: Popped within an hour of use. Looked cool for a little bit though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Strause

customer_reviews.title: air doesnt stay to long
customer_reviews.text: Product had a hole. so I had to buy a patch. IDK if its the product but air wont stay in to long. not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute it was a hit for the pool party I had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Used it one day and it had multiple small holes in it. Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS FOR INE TIME USE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Product popped in one day, after inflating it i set it on my boat and came back to it the next day and it had already popped. DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS FOR INE TIME USE ONLY
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: This float is so much fun! My only complaint is that I’ve seen others ...
customer_reviews.text: This float is so much fun! My only complaint is that I’ve seen others that come with something to anchor it down so it would stay in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for someone, recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Hole in side
customer_reviews.text: Item came with a hole in the side and it gives me no option to return the item or get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: 4 extra cup holders for players
customer_reviews.text: Liked the coloring, liked the cooler in the center, the extra cup holders are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to inflate and fit perfectly in our pool. It was a lot of fun for the adults
customer_reviews.author: Katie Corio

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. But the lid to the cooler first time opening it it put a hole in the table. Now it won’t hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon McCall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have used ours several times already and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: This was a great addition to our pool this summer
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to our pool this summer. Now we don’t even have to leave the pool to grab a nice cold one and with the cooler feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Major Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This item did not even stay inflated for 24 hours. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Met all our expectations and was very happy with the product !!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Awesome Price, highly recommend to anyone looking to have fun in a pool! Can also double as a floating bed with cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: Greg M

customer_reviews.title: Air valve with no air restriction, makes this almost impossible to inflate fully.
customer_reviews.text: This is almost impossible to inflate fully. The inflate valve is about the size of a quarter, and you have to have a pump. You can't blow this up manually. Second, there is nothing inside the valve to stop the airflow, like a flap. So after you fill with a pump, as soon as you attempt to close the valve, you lose a lot of air. Took 5 tries and then it is still deflated more that I would like. I would not buy this product again,nor would I recommend this to anyone until a close flap would be included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Popped
customer_reviews.text: It was great but popped after the second party. Not worth it if it’s only lasts a couple party’s.
customer_reviews.author: richard m okamoto

customer_reviews.title: First try and already has a hole in it.
customer_reviews.text: First time using it and it already has a hole in it where the cover of the cooler connects. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ripped pretty easily by the cooler hinge. Certainly don't try and swipe the ping pong balls away.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Haight

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used it for its intended purpose last weekend and learned this weekend it makes a great raft for a 1 year old!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bridwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great raft with 2 packs of balls...just needs the cups!
customer_reviews.author: LaReine Chabut

product_meta.title: dreambuilderToy Inflatable Pool Party Barge Floating Beer Pong Float with Cooler, White, 6-Feet, - Floating Pool Party Game Raft and Lounge(Beer Pong)
product_meta.description: This is cool 2019 redesign of the beer pong float. Get it for your party and make your party fun again!!
feature_bullets: [Party Fun] ELEVATE YOUR POOL PARTY with Full 10 cup beer pong float with built cooler
[Huge Size] 6 feet Long x 3 feet Wide, provide a comfort float
[PARTY PROOF] - Super thick, extra durable raft grade PVC that’s scratch and tear resistant.
[Fast Valves] With fast Valve, allows inflation with hairdryer, toy air pump or compressor and deflate 5 times faster than traditional valve
[100% satisfactions guarantee]: Guarantee refund/replace if anything happens up to a year. Just contact us and we will refund/replace for you. No Hassle guaranteed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars371 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
